Name: THROWDOWN BOXING 2
About the game: Featuring thirteen of the most gifted, dynamic and powerful boxers on earth and beyond squaring off in the famous Throwdown Boxing Association competition. Choose your Kid Titan, male or female, customize them and either enter training mode or head right into the competition! Prove you are the best of the best and the true champion while simultaneously saving the world from the villainous Ned 'Cry Baby' Nerdman! Throwdown Boxing 2 contains thirteen bouts against increasingly skilled opponents in the Minor, Major and Championship Circuits. Earn power coins after devastating blows to earn super uppercuts to maximize damage. Learn to chain your combos at the right moments to deliver lengthy and damaging combos to KO your opponents! Each opponent has a weakness to exploit and skills to counter and ultimately, after becoming champion, you will to face-off with The Creator in the acclaimed Dream Bout!! Good luck Kid Titan!
